page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I live in Comberbach, Cheshire. In the morning, in fact it seems the crack of dawn, my dad comes into my room and says "Come on, school!". I get up suddenly and put my clothes on. I get a cup of tea and have my breakfast, which I don't like. Next, we sort ourselves out and leave for school. When we arrive at school, I wait in the car for my friends. When they arrive, we go into the playground. The bell rings and we go into school. Then we go into Assembly. After that Miss Tierney tells us what we are going to do for the rest of the day. Most days we get Maths up until break at 10.15. Next we do things like English. Art is really good, it is my favourite, we do it after dinner until 2.15 break. After break we work until home time at 3.30. When I go home, I play with my Doberman. I go to bed at 10 o'clock.
